entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:01 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this morning and early this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
